mapper.select: SELECT M.USERNAME, M.PASSWORD, M.EMAIL, R.NUM, R.ROLENAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN MEMBERROLE MR ON(M.USERNAME = MR.USERNAME) INNER JOIN ROLE R ON (MR.NUM = R.NUM) WHERE M.USERNAME = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, BIRTH, ENABLED) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT NUM FROM ROLE WHERE ROLENAME = #{roleName}
SELECT USERNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET LASTTIME = now() WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
UPDATE MEMBER SET ENABLED = 0 WHERE LASTTIME < SUBDATE(now(), INTERVAL 3 DAY)
mapper.select: SELECT NAME, EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE DATE_FORMAT(BIRTH, '%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m-%d')
SELECT USERNAME, EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
